text: Staffan Hellstrand, Mats Eric Staffan Hellstrand, born 13 May 1956 in Stockholm, Sweden is a Swedish singer, rock musician (guitar, harmonica, keyboard), songwriter and record producer. He has scored record successes at the Swedish charts during the 1990's.Swedish singles chart positions ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== *Hemlös (1989) *Den stora blå vägen (1991) *Eld (1992) *Regn (1993) *Sot (1994) *Pascha Jims dagbok (1996) *Underland (1998) *Underbarn (1999) *Starsång (2001) *Socker & synder (2002) *Elektriska gatan (2004) *Motljus (2006) *Spökskepp (2007) *Staffan Hellstrand (2012) ===Compilation albums=== *Staffan Hellstrand & SH! samling 85–92 (1993) *Staffan Hellstrands bästa (2000) *Diamanter (2004) *Lilla fågel blå (2009) == References == ==Other websites== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish singers
title: Staffan Hellstrand
